title: UK May Soon Bring 'Assisted Dying' Law. Lawmaker Explains Its Safeguards
content: A proposed law allowing terminally ill adults in England and Wales to end their lives was published on Tuesday, setting out safeguards such as ensuring the approval of doctors and judges to try to ease concerns in Britain over its possible misuse.
summary: A proposed law allowing terminally ill adults in England and Wales to end their lives was published on Tuesday, setting out safeguards such as ensuring the approval of doctors and judges to try to ease concerns in Britain over its possible misuse.

title: Trump Expected To Pick Kristi Noem As Chief Of Homeland Security
content: Donald Trump was expected Tuesday to pick South Dakota Governor Kristi Noem to head the US Department of Homeland Security, a powerful post at the center of the incoming president's tough-on-immigration policies.
summary: Donald Trump was expected Tuesday to pick South Dakota Governor Kristi Noem to head the US Department of Homeland Security, a powerful post at the center of the incoming president's tough-on-immigration policies.

title: US Space Startup Firefly Valued At Over $2 Billion In Latest Funding Round
content: Firefly Aerospace has raised $175 million in a late-stage funding round led by RPM Ventures, valuing the space startup at more than $2 billion, it said on Tuesday.
summary: Firefly Aerospace has raised $175 million in a late-stage funding round led by RPM Ventures, valuing the space startup at more than $2 billion, it said on Tuesday.

title: Explained: How Methane Emissions Threaten Climate Goals
content: Fast-rising methane emissions could undermine efforts to limit global warming by mid-century, prompting scientists and policymakers to urge aggressive action to curb output of the potent greenhouse gas.
summary: Fast-rising methane emissions could undermine efforts to limit global warming by mid-century, prompting scientists and policymakers to urge aggressive action to curb output of the potent greenhouse gas.

title: Judge Delays Decision In Trump's New York Criminal Case To November 19
content: The judge in Donald Trump's New York criminal case has delayed to November 19 a decision on potentially throwing out the US president-elect's conviction, the court said Tuesday.
summary: The judge in Donald Trump's New York criminal case has delayed to November 19 a decision on potentially throwing out the US president-elect's conviction, the court said Tuesday.

title: 11 Injured After Severe Turbulence Onboard Lufthansa Flight To Frankfurt
content: Eleven people were injured when a Lufthansa flight from Buenos Aires to Frankfurt hit severe turbulence while travelling over the Atlantic, the airline said on Tuesday.
summary: Eleven people were injured when a Lufthansa flight from Buenos Aires to Frankfurt hit severe turbulence while travelling over the Atlantic, the airline said on Tuesday.

title: Starlink In India Soon? Elon Musk Takes On Mukesh Ambani's Reliance Jio
content: India's internet and telecom sector is likely to get a new entrant - Elon Musk's Starlink - a game-changer for internet users in the world's most populous nation. Elon Musk will be taking on behemoths like Mukesh Ambani's Jio and Sunil Bharti Mittal.
summary: India's internet and telecom sector is likely to get a new entrant - Elon Musk's Starlink - a game-changer for internet users in the world's most populous nation. Elon Musk will be taking on behemoths like Mukesh Ambani's Jio and Sunil Bharti Mittal.

title: 11 Killed In Military Air Strike On Teashop In Myanmar
content: Eleven people were killed when a teashop in Myanmar was hit by a military airstrike in the town of Naungcho in the northern Shan state on Tuesday afternoon, a spokesperson for a local ethnic armed group said.
summary: Eleven people were killed when a teashop in Myanmar was hit by a military airstrike in the town of Naungcho in the northern Shan state on Tuesday afternoon, a spokesperson for a local ethnic armed group said.

title: Microsoft May Go The Apple Way, Rebrand Copilot To Windows Intelligence
content: The rebranding exercise might put all the AI features offered by Microsoft through a subscription model under the name of "Microsoft Intelligence"
summary: The rebranding exercise might put all the AI features offered by Microsoft through a subscription model under the name of "Microsoft Intelligence"

title: Iran, Russia Link Banking Systems In Latest Bid To Counter Sanctions
content: Iranian bank cards can now be used in Russia, state television reported, as the two countries linked their banking systems in the latest bid to counteract sanctions.
summary: Iranian bank cards can now be used in Russia, state television reported, as the two countries linked their banking systems in the latest bid to counteract sanctions.

title: Trump Plans Immigration Crackdown, Aims To End Biden's Entry Programs
content: President-elect Donald Trump is expected to take a slew of executive actions on his first day in the White House to ramp up immigration enforcement and roll back President Joe Biden's flagship legal entry programs.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump is expected to take a slew of executive actions on his first day in the White House to ramp up immigration enforcement and roll back President Joe Biden's flagship legal entry programs.

title: Israel Army Announces Gaza Aid On Eve Of US-Imposed Deadline
content: Israel's army announced the opening Tuesday of an additional aid crossing into Gaza, on the eve of a US-imposed deadline to improve humanitarian conditions for Palestinians in the war-ravaged territory.
summary: Israel's army announced the opening Tuesday of an additional aid crossing into Gaza, on the eve of a US-imposed deadline to improve humanitarian conditions for Palestinians in the war-ravaged territory.

title: Russia Passes Law Banning "Child-Free Propaganda" Amid Demographic Decline
content: Russian MPs on Tuesday passed in the final third reading controversial legislation banning "propaganda" of remaining childless, the latest measure targeting what Moscow depicts as Western liberal ideas.
summary: Russian MPs on Tuesday passed in the final third reading controversial legislation banning "propaganda" of remaining childless, the latest measure targeting what Moscow depicts as Western liberal ideas.

title: Biden Wipes Away Tear During 'God Bless America' At Event To Honour Veterans
content: During a Veterans Day ceremony on November 11, US President Joe Biden got emotional while he joined everyone in singing God Bless America.
summary: During a Veterans Day ceremony on November 11, US President Joe Biden got emotional while he joined everyone in singing God Bless America.

title: 35 Killed, Over 40 Injured After Car Runs Over Pedestrians In China
content: Thirty-five people were killed and 43 wounded after a car ploughed into pedestrians Monday evening in the southern Chinese city of Zhuhai, local police said Tuesday.
summary: Thirty-five people were killed and 43 wounded after a car ploughed into pedestrians Monday evening in the southern Chinese city of Zhuhai, local police said Tuesday.

title: Krispy Kreme To Celebrate World Kindness Day With Free Doughnuts
content: The offer is valid across the US. Some of its international locations - the chain operates in 40 countries - also have World Kindness Day promotions planned.
summary: The offer is valid across the US. Some of its international locations - the chain operates in 40 countries - also have World Kindness Day promotions planned.

title: Iran Open To Talks With Trump Administration If Interests Align
content: Iran will pursue whatever secures its interest, government spokesperson Fatemeh Mohajerani said on Tuesday, when asked if there could be direct talks with the Trump administration.
summary: Iran will pursue whatever secures its interest, government spokesperson Fatemeh Mohajerani said on Tuesday, when asked if there could be direct talks with the Trump administration.

title: Japan's Fukushima Radioactive Debris Reaches Lab After Secret Robot Op
content: A small amount of radioactive debris removed by a robot from Japan's stricken Fukushima nuclear plant has arrived at a research lab near Tokyo, the plant operator said Tuesday, after a journey kept secret for safety reasons.
summary: A small amount of radioactive debris removed by a robot from Japan's stricken Fukushima nuclear plant has arrived at a research lab near Tokyo, the plant operator said Tuesday, after a journey kept secret for safety reasons.

title: Liz Truss Spent Her Finals Days As PM Preparing For Russian Nuclear Strike
content: Ms Truss was reportedly informed that the Russian president was mere hours from deploying a nuclear weapon.
summary: Ms Truss was reportedly informed that the Russian president was mere hours from deploying a nuclear weapon.

title: Kai Trump Shares Behind The Scenes Of Family Pic With Musk On Victory Night
content: Kai Trump, the granddaughter of US President-elect Donald Trump, has shared glimpses of their family celebrations on election night following her grandfather's win over Kamala Harris.
summary: Kai Trump, the granddaughter of US President-elect Donald Trump, has shared glimpses of their family celebrations on election night following her grandfather's win over Kamala Harris.
